about_the_game:
If light is perfect, why does darkness exist? This is the Light Paradox, and the inspiration behind our universe.

Dive into a fantastic universe filled with secrets to uncover as your mission unfolds. Embrace the mysteries of creation and discover who or what lies “behind the curtain” as you meet new creatures and fight unexpected battles along the way!
Choose your own path. Be anything you want to be: a farmer, a merchant, a thief, a miner, a hunter, a necromancer and much more...

The main character "Hana" is looking for her girlfriend who was kidnapped by an evil cult. Find her before is too late!

This 2D J-RPG/survival game was made for those who enjoy the old traditional J-RPG style video games.

Implemented Features

  • Open world
  • Survival "hunger/thirst" mechanics
  • Item branched upgrades
  • Social simulation and social EXP
  • Moon cycles
  • Hidden characters

content_descriptors.notes: This game has adult content including the use of alcohol and/or controlled substances.

short_description: Light Paradox is a J-RPG/Survival 2D pixel-art game. The story behind the creation of the universe, the information control and the individual character story line all mixed together into a complex world.
